amendment.description: An amendment numbered 126 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds from being used to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule entitled: "Medicare and Medicaid Programs: Minimum Staffing Standards for Long-Term Care Facilities and Medicaid Institutional Payment Transparency Reporting (CMS 3442-P)".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
